DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess safety , tolerability , biological activity SD-101 compare placebo healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics SD-101 Healthy Normal Males
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , randomize , single-blind , placebo-controlled study five escalate dose level SD-101 healthy male volunteer . The objective study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetic profile , pharmacodynamics SD-101 . Approximately 40 subject participate . Once subject consent , screen , assign one dose level SD-101 , subject receive single subcutaneous injection either SD-101 placebo ( PBS ) ratio 6:2 . Safety tolerability evaluate occurrence adverse event , blood urine laboratory test , physical examination finding , vital sign , electrocardiogram finding . Pharmacodynamics evaluate level blood biomarkers serum cytokine , flow cytometric cell count . Pharmacokinetics evaluate level study drug serum .
DOC.criteria: Signed , write , informed consent must obtain subject studyspecific procedure perform . Subject must male 18 year age old . Subject must willing submit urine drug screen agree abstain alcohol , caffeine , tobacco require stay Phase I Unit . Subject must willing abide rule Phase 1 Unit . Subjects whose sexual partner childbearing potential must agree use effective method birth control ( i.e. , chemical contraceptive , barrier plus spermicide , intrauterine device ) treatment phase 14 day post treatment . Must negative Hepatitis B C human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . Females . Clinically significant active , acute , chronic illness . History coagulation bleed disorder . Clinically significant chronic recent ( within 21 day dose ) acute gastrointestinal disorder nausea , vomit diarrhea major symptom . Received vaccine within 3 week study entry plan vaccinate within 6 week study injection . History significant cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease . History evaluation autoimmune disease include systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) , rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) , scleroderma thyroiditis . Significant psychiatric illness could potentially interfere assessment study . Subjects prior surgery major infection within 6 month dose . History medication within 7 day dose , except vitamin and/or mineral . History Gilbert 's disease .
